name: src/Components/Button/Button.js
src/Components/ToolTip/ToolTip.js
getButtons
description: builds out the buttons for the tooltip

name: getPosition
description: gets the middle of the left and right of the Selection instance

unknown.tagValue: {[Object]} obj - object with top and left defined to be used as style rules

return.description: obj - object with top and left defined to be used as style rules

name: src/Utils/ButtonUtils.js
src/Utils/CommentUtils.js
src/Utils/FacebookUtils.js
src/Utils/TwitterUtils.js
src/Utils/Utils.js

params.name: args
params.description: any arguments can be passed to the console log

unknown.tagValue: {Function(Function(Function(tagName, attributes, text)))} - tag wrapper with supplied arguments

name: replaceNewlines
description: replaces new lines (\n and \r) with spaces

unknown.tagValue: {Function} - function to be executed with supplied string

return.description: function to be executed with supplied string

name: getUrl
description: gets the current url without params

name: newTab
description: creates a new tab with url and focuses on it

params.name: url
params.description: url to open in a new tab

name: src/index.js
src/registerServiceWorker.js

content:
{
  "name": "highlighter",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "private": true,
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0",
    "asyncawait": "^1.0.7",
    "autoprefixer": "7.1.6",
    "babel-core": "6.26.0",
    "babel-eslint": "7.2.3",
    "babel-jest": "20.0.3",
    "babel-loader": "7.1.2",
    "babel-preset-react-app": "^3.1.2",
    "babel-runtime": "6.26.0",
    "case-sensitive-paths-webpack-plugin": "2.1.1",
    "chalk": "1.1.3",
    "css-loader": "0.28.7",
    "dotenv": "4.0.0",
    "dotenv-expand": "4.2.0",
    "eslint": "4.10.0",
    "eslint-config-react-app": "^2.1.0",
    "eslint-loader": "1.9.0",
    "eslint-plugin-flowtype": "2.39.1",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "2.8.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "5.1.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "7.4.0",
    "extract-text-webpack-plugin": "3.0.2",
    "file-loader": "1.1.5",
    "fs-extra": "3.0.1",
    "html-webpack-plugin": "2.29.0",
    "jest": "20.0.4",
    "object-assign": "4.1.1",
    "postcss-flexbugs-fixes": "3.2.0",
    "postcss-loader": "2.0.8",
    "promise": "8.0.1",
    "raf": "3.4.0",
    "ramda": "^0.25.0",
    "react": "^16.4.2",
    "react-dev-utils": "^5.0.2",
    "react-dom": "^16.4.2",
    "renamer": "^1.0.0",
    "resolve": "1.6.0",
    "style-loader": "0.19.0",
    "sw-precache-webpack-plugin": "0.11.4",
    "url-loader": "0.6.2",
    "webpack": "3.8.1",
    "webpack-dev-server": "2.11.3",
    "webpack-manifest-plugin": "1.3.2",
    "whatwg-fetch": "2.0.3"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node scripts/start.js",
    "test": "node scripts/test.js --env=jsdom",
    "build-rename": "npm run build-rename-js && npm run build-rename-css",
    "build-rename-js": "cp build/static/js/main.*.js build/static/js/highlighter.js",
    "build-rename-css": "cp build/static/css/main.*.css build/static/css/highlighter.css",
    "build": "node scripts/build.js && npm run build-rename"
  },
  "jest": {
    "collectCoverageFrom": [
      "src/**/*.{js,jsx,mjs}"
    ],
    "setupFiles": [
      "<rootDir>/config/polyfills.js"
    ],
    "testMatch": [
      "<rootDir>/src/**/__tests__/**/*.{js,jsx,mjs}",
      "<rootDir>/src/**/?(*.)(spec|test).{js,jsx,mjs}"
    ],
    "testEnvironment": "node",
    "testURL": "http://localhost",
    "transform": {
      "^.+\\.(js|jsx|mjs)$": "<rootDir>/node_modules/babel-jest",
      "^.+\\.css$": "<rootDir>/config/jest/cssTransform.js",
      "^(?!.*\\.(js|jsx|mjs|css|json)$)": "<rootDir>/config/jest/fileTransform.js"
    },
    "transformIgnorePatterns": [
      "[/\\\\]node_modules[/\\\\].+\\.(js|jsx|mjs)$"
    ],
    "moduleNameMapper": {
      "^react-native$": "react-native-web"
    },
    "moduleFileExtensions": [
      "web.js",
      "js",
      "json",
      "web.jsx",
      "jsx",
      "node",
      "mjs"
    ]
  },
  "babel": {
    "presets": [
      "react-app"
    ]
  },
  "eslintConfig": {
    "extends": "react-app"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-optional-chaining": "^7.0.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "renamer": "^1.0.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
